arStrings.szText:
(PH) {c_label}{u}Ultimate Centipede{/u}{/c} 
{icon:bullet,1.2} The Centipede emerges and Knocks Down enemies, dealing {c_number}{payload:SOIL_EMERGE_DAMAGE}{/c} Poison damage and applying {c_number}{dot:SOIL_POISON}{/c} Poisoning over {c_number}{buffduration:SOIL_POISON}{/c} seconds. Non-Boss enemies are instantly consumed if their entire remaining Life becomes Poisoned while in the area.

As it emerges, {c_important}The Devourer{/c} launches {c_number}{SF_23}{/c} toxic globs that apply {c_number}{dot:UPGRADE_POISON_DOT}{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[{buffduration:UPGRADE_POISON_DOT}]{/c} seconds wherever they land.

While {c_important}The Devourer{/c} is active, if a Non-Boss enemy's remaining Life becomes Poisoned they die instantly and unleash a {c_important}Pestilent Swarm{/c} that deals {c_number}{payload:UPGRADE_PAYLOAD}{/c} damage per hit to enemies it passes through.
